data_table.description: MRI and Neuropsychological Measures for Both Baseline and Follow-up (Offspring Cohort), brain MRI and neuropsychological battery measures were done between April 1999 and November 2011. Exclusion criteria for this dataset are located in vr_mrbne7fx_2011_1_0486s.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Unique study participant identification number

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study cohort identifier

variable.name: mr_x7fu_int
variable.description: Number of years between baseline and follow-up MRI

variable.name: np_x7fu_int
variable.description: Number of years between baseline and follow-up Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: tcv_x7fu
variable.description: Total cranial volume for baseline MRI closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: tcbv_x7fu
variable.description: Total hemispheric brain volume for baseline MRI closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: wmhiv_x7fu
variable.description: White matter hyperintensities for baseline MRI closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: fbvv_x7fu
variable.description: Frontal brain volume for baseline MRI closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: tbvv_x7fu
variable.description: Temporal lobe volume for baseline MRI closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: thvv_x7fu
variable.description: Temporal horn volume for baseline MRI closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: obvv_x7fu
variable.description: Occipital brain volume for baseline MRI closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: pbvv_x7fu
variable.description: Parietal brain volume for baseline MRI closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: opbvv_x7fu
variable.description: Occipital plus parietal brain volume for baseline MRI closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: hpvv_x7fu
variable.description: Hippocampal volume for baseline MRI closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: lvvv_x7fu
variable.description: Lateral ventricular volume for baseline MRI closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: LMi_x7fu
variable.description: Logical memory score, immediate for baseline Neuropsychology battery closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: LMd_x7fu
variable.description: Logical memory score, delayed for baseline Neuropsychology battery closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: LMr_x7fu
variable.description: Logical memory score, recognition for baseline Neuropsychology battery closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: PASi_x7fu
variable.description: Paired associates score, immediate for baseline Neuropsychology battery closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: PASd_x7fu
variable.description: Paired associates score, delayed for baseline Neuropsychology battery closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: VRi_x7fu
variable.description: Visual reproductions score, immediate for baseline Neuropsychology battery closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: VRd_x7fu
variable.description: Visual reproductions score, delayed for baseline Neuropsychology battery closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: VRr_x7fu
variable.description: Visual reproductions score, recognition for baseline Neuropsychology battery closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: TrA_x7fu
variable.description: Trails A for baseline Neuropsychology battery closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: TrB_x7fu
variable.description: Trails B for baseline Neuropsychology battery closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: SIM_x7fu
variable.description: Similarities score for baseline Neuropsychology battery closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: HVOT_x7fu
variable.description: Hooper visual organization test score for baseline Neuropsychology battery closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: wrat_x7fu
variable.description: Wide range achievement test score for baseline Neuropsychology battery closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: BNT30_x7fu
variable.description: Boston naming test score, 30 items for baseline Neuropsychology battery closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: TrB_TrA_x7fu
variable.description: Trails B minus Trails A for baseline Neuropsychology battery closest to clinic Exam 7

variable.name: agemri
variable.description: Age at MRI

variable.name: education
variable.description: Education

variable.name: agenp
variable.description: Age at Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: tcv_x7fuAC
variable.description: Total cranial volume annualized change between baseline and follow-up MRI

variable.name: tcbv_x7fuAC
variable.description: Total hemispheric brain volume annualized change between baseline and follow-up MRI

variable.name: wmhiv_x7fuAC
variable.description: White matter hyperintensities annualized change between baseline and follow-up MRI

variable.description: Frontal brain volume annualized change between baseline and follow-up MRI

variable.description: Temporal lobe volume annualized change between baseline and follow-up MRI

variable.description: Temporal horn volume annualized change between baseline and follow-up MRI

variable.description: Occipital brain volume annualized change between baseline and follow-up MRI

variable.name: pbvv_x7fuAC
variable.description: Parietal brain volume annualized change between baseline and follow-up MRI

variable.name: opbvv_x7fuAC
variable.description: Occipital plus parietal brain volume annualized change between baseline and follow-up MRI

variable.name: hpvv_x7fuAC
variable.description: Hippocampal volume annualized change between baseline and follow-up MRI

variable.name: lvvv_x7fuAC
variable.description: Lateral ventricular volume annualized change between baseline and follow-up MRI

variable.name: LMi_x7fuAC
variable.description: Logical memory score, immediate annualized change between the baseline and follow-up Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: LMd_x7fuAC
variable.description: Logical memory score, delayed annualized change between the baseline and follow-up Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: LMr_x7fuAC
variable.description: Logical memory score, recognition annualized change between the baseline and follow-up Neuropsychology battery

variable.description: Visual reproductions score, delayed annualized change between the baseline and follow-up Neuropsychology battery

variable.description: Visual reproductions score, recognition annualized change between the baseline and follow-up Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: TrA_x7fuAC
variable.description: Trails A annualized change between the baseline and follow-up Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: TrB_x7fuAC
variable.description: Trails B annualized change between the baseline and follow-up Neuropsychology battery

variable.description: Similarities score annualized change between the baseline and follow-up Neuropsychology battery

variable.description: Hooper visual organization test score annualized change between the baseline and follow-up Neuropsychology battery

variable.description: Boston naming test score, 30 items annualized change between the baseline and follow-up Neuropsychology battery

variable.description: Trails B minus Trails A annualized change between the baseline and follow-up Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: mr_x7fu
variable.description: Date of follow-up MRI
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality. Number of days since exam 1.

variable.name: np_x7fu
variable.description: Date of follow-up Neuropsychology battery
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality. Number of days since exam 1.
